subject: Recordings and Downloads (Video)
Tennis
Computers and the Internet
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Hawk-Eye, a network of cameras and computers used to track the flight of a tennis ball, is probably one of the most successful instant-replay systems in sports.
snippet: Hawk-Eye, a network of cameras and computers used to track the flight of a tennis ball, is probably one of the most successful instant-replay systems in sports.
